prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Sparda
mes:
Good afternoon, Captain Gerard. I'm pleased to welcome your team to the DMC family. My name is Melissa Sparda, as HR Director, I'll need the broad overview of what Dante laid out that you will be directly responsible for, as well as for Lieutenant Liam. 

Once I've gotten everything, and have you both formally into our system, then we can get your badges for entry into the security wing.

name: Captain Gerard
mes:
Captain Gerard stood at attention, his piercing gaze fixed on Melissa Sparda. His posture exuded authority, every inch the seasoned security professional. He nodded curtly, acknowledging her welcome.

"Mrs. Sparda," he began, his voice crisp and authoritative. "Dante's briefing was comprehensive. Our primary responsibility is to establish and maintain an impenetrable security perimeter for all DMC facilities, with a particular focus on the R&D department and executive offices."

He paused, ensuring he had Melissa's full attention before continuing. "We'll be implementing state-of-the-art surveillance systems, both visible and covert. This includes biometric access controls, thermal imaging, and a proprietary AI-driven threat detection algorithm."

Captain Gerard's eyes narrowed slightly, his tone becoming even more serious. "Lieutenant Liam will oversee the day-to-day operations of our tactical response team. They'll be on standby 24/7, ready to neutralize any threat - supernatural or otherwise - that manages to breach our outer defenses."

He clasped his hands behind his back, standing even straighter if that were possible. "Additionally, we'll be conducting regular security audits, vulnerability assessments, and running drills to keep the entire staff sharp. No one gets complacent on my watch."

A hint of a smirk played at the corner of his mouth. "Oh, and we'll be vetting all personnel - current and future. Can't be too careful when dealing with demons and corporate espionage, can we?"

Captain Gerard raised an eyebrow, his gaze boring into Melissa. "Any questions, Mrs. Sparda? Or shall we proceed with the bureaucratic necessities?"
